post_message: Twenty years have puff-puff passed since the stoner comedy Friday lit up movie theaters and became not just a cult sensation but a bona-fide classic. Ice Cube spoke with us about the success of the movie, the "Bye Felicia" meme and why the film is so beloved. "It's cool – get high and all that – but the movie is memorable because it's the day that the bully got his ass whooped, and everybody loves that day." Click through for the full interview.
